TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Overlapped extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 Win32 OVERLAPPED 结构的托管表现形式，包括从 实例向 结构传输信息的方法。

span.span: Provides a managed representation of a Win32 OVERLAPPED structure, including methods to transfer information from an instance to a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 方法将信息从 对象传输到可为异步文件 i/o 传递到 Windows API 函数的 结构。The and methods transfer information from an object to a structure that can be passed to Windows API functions for asynchronous file I/O. 方法将信息从 结构传输到 类的实例。The method transfers information from a structure to an instance of the class. 对 对象的属性的更改会影响其关联的 结构，反之亦然。Changes to the properties of an object affect its associated structure, and vice versa.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新的空实例。

span.span: Initializes a new, empty instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可获取派生自 类的任何托管同步事件的句柄。Use the property to get the handle of any managed synchronization event that derives from the class. 的实现提供有关 i/o 操作的状态信息。Your implementation of provides status information on the I/O operation. 将其传递到 `ar` 参数中的构造函数，稍后用 属性进行检索。Pass it to the constructor in the `ar` parameter, and retrieve it later with the property. 如果为 或 方法指定了回调方法，则回调可以通过解包接收到的 结构来检索您的 。If a callback method is specified for the or method, the callback can retrieve your by unpacking the structure it receives.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取从 类派生的托管同步对象的句柄，请使用 属性获取 对象，然后调用 方法。To get the handle of a managed synchronization object that derives from the class, use the property to get a object, and then call the method. 的实现提供有关 i/o 操作的状态信息。Your implementation of provides status information on the I/O operation. 将其传递到 `ar` 参数中的构造函数，稍后用 属性进行检索。Pass it to the constructor in the `ar` parameter, and retrieve it later with the property. 如果为 或 方法指定了回调方法，则回调可以通过解包接收到的 结构来检索您的 。If a callback method is specified for the or method, the callback can retrieve your by unpacking the structure it receives.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Free(valuetype System.Threading.NativeOverlapped* nativeOverlappedPtr) cil managed

param.name: nativeOverlappedPtr
param.span: 指向要释放的 结构的指针。

span.span: A pointer to the structure to be freed.

summary.span: 释放与 方法分配的本机重叠结构关联的非托管内存。

span.span: Frees the unmanaged memory associated with a native overlapped structure allocated by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必须对从 方法接收的每个 指针只调用一次 方法。You must call the method exactly once on every pointer you receive from the method. 如果未调用 方法，则会泄漏内存。If you don't call the method, you will leak memory. 如果多次调用 方法，内存将损坏。If you call the method more than once, memory will be corrupted.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Threading.NativeOverlapped* Pack(class System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback iocb) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This method is not safe. Use Pack (iocb, userData) instead. https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")
System.Obsolete("This method is not safe. Use Pack (iocb, userData) instead. https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")
System.Obsolete("This method is not safe. Use Pack (iocb, userData) instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

param.name: iocb
param.span: 一个 委托，表示在异步 I/O 操作完成时调用的回调方法。

span.span: An delegate that represents the callback method invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation completes.

summary.span: 将当前实例打包为一个 结构，并指定当异步 I/O 操作完成时调用的委托。

span.span: Packs the current instance into a structure, specifying the delegate to be invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation is complete.

returns.span: 一个指向 结构的非托管指针。

span.span: An unmanaged pointer to a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的非托管指针可以在重叠 i/o 操作中传递到操作系统。The unmanaged pointer returned by this method can be passed to the operating system in overlapped I/O operations. 在调用 之前， 结构在物理内存中是固定的。The structure is fixed in physical memory until is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 调用方负责固定缓冲区。The caller is responsible for pinning the buffer. 但是，如果卸载了应用程序域，则会销毁固定缓冲区的句柄，并释放缓冲区，以使 i/o 操作写入已释放的地址。If the application domain is unloaded, however, the handle to the pinned buffer is destroyed and the buffer is released, leaving the I/O operation to write to the freed address. 出于此原因，更好的做法是使用 方法重载，其中运行时固定缓冲区。For this reason, it is better to use the method overload, in which the runtime pins the buffer.

span.span: The current has already been packed.

permission.span: 需要对直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 部分受信任的或透明的代码不能使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.NativeOverlapped* Pack (System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback iocb, object userData);
.method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Threading.NativeOverlapped* Pack(class System.Threading.IOCompletionCallback iocb, object userData) cil managed

param.name: iocb
param.span: 一个 委托，表示在异步 I/O 操作完成时调用的回调方法。

span.span: An delegate that represents the callback method invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation completes.

param.name: userData
param.span: 对象或对象的数组，表示用于操作的输入或输出缓冲区。

span.span: An object or array of objects representing the input or output buffer for the operation.

param.span: 每个对象都表示一个缓冲区，例如字节数组。

span.span: Each object represents a buffer, for example an array of bytes.

summary.span: 将当前实例打包为一个 结构，并指定当异步 I/O 操作完成时调用的委托，以及作为缓冲区的托管对象。

span.span: Packs the current instance into a structure, specifying a delegate that is invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation is complete and a managed object that serves as a buffer.

returns.span: 一个指向 结构的非托管指针。

span.span: An unmanaged pointer to a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的非托管指针可以在重叠 i/o 操作中传递到操作系统。The unmanaged pointer returned by this method can be passed to the operating system in overlapped I/O operations. 在调用 之前， 结构在物理内存中是固定的。The structure is fixed in physical memory until is called. `userData` 中指定的缓冲区必须与传递到执行异步 i/o 的非托管操作系统函数的缓冲区相同。The buffer or buffers specified in `userData` must be the same as those passed to the unmanaged operating system function that performs the asynchronous I/O. > [!NOTE] > 在 i/o 操作的持续时间内，运行时会固定 `userData` 中指定的缓冲区。The runtime pins the buffer or buffers specified in `userData` for the duration of the I/O operation. 如果卸载了应用程序域，则运行时会将内存保持固定状态，直到 i/o 操作完成。If the application domain is unloaded, the runtime keeps the memory pinned until the I/O operation completes.

span.span: The current has already been packed.

permission.span: 需要对直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 部分受信任的或透明的代码不能使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

span.span: An unmanaged pointer to a structure.

summary.span: 将指定的非托管 结构解压缩为 对象。

span.span: Unpacks the specified unmanaged structure into a managed object.

returns.span: 一个 对象，包含从本机结构解压缩的信息。

span.span: An object containing the information unpacked from the native structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用 方法之前，不会从物理内存释放 结构。The structure is not freed from physical memory until you call the method.

span.span: Does not propagate the calling stack.

System.Obsolete("This method is not safe. Use UnsafePack (iocb, userData) instead. https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")
System.Obsolete("This method is not safe. Use UnsafePack (iocb, userData) instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

param.name: iocb
param.span: 一个 委托，表示在异步 I/O 操作完成时调用的回调方法。

span.span: An delegate that represents the callback method invoked when the asynchronous I/O operation completes.

summary.span: 将当前实例打包为一个 结构，并指定当异步 I/O 操作完成时调用的委托。

span.span: Packs the current instance into a structure specifying the delegate to invoke when the asynchronous I/O operation is complete.

summary.span: 不传播该调用堆栈。

span.span: Does not propagate the calling stack.

returns.span: 一个指向 结构的非托管指针。

span.span: An unmanaged pointer to a structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的非托管指针可以在重叠 i/o 操作中传递到操作系统。The unmanaged pointer returned by this method can be passed to the operating system in overlapped I/O operations. 在调用 之前， 结构在物理内存中是固定的。The structure is fixed in physical memory until is called. 调用方负责固定缓冲区。The caller is responsible for pinning the buffer. 但是，如果卸载了应用程序域，则会销毁固定缓冲区的句柄，并释放缓冲区，以使 i/o 操作写入已释放的地址。If the application domain is unloaded, however, the handle to the pinned buffer is destroyed and the buffer is released, leaving the I/O operation to write to the freed address. 出于此原因，更好的做法是使用 方法重载，其中运行时固定缓冲区。For this reason, it is better to use the method overload, in which the runtime pins the buffer. > [!CAUTION] > 使用 方法可能会无意中打开安全漏洞。Using the method could inadvertently open up a security hole. 代码访问安全性根据堆栈上所有调用方的权限检查其权限。Code access security bases its permission checks on the permissions of all the callers on the stack. 方法不传播调用堆栈。The method does not propagate the calling stack. 恶意代码可以利用此漏洞来避免权限检查。Malicious code might be able to exploit this to avoid permission checks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的非托管指针可以在重叠 i/o 操作中传递到操作系统。The unmanaged pointer returned by this method can be passed to the operating system in overlapped I/O operations. 在调用 之前， 结构在物理内存中是固定的。The structure is fixed in physical memory until is called. `userData` 中指定的缓冲区必须与传递到执行异步 i/o 的非托管操作系统函数的缓冲区相同。The buffer or buffers specified in `userData` must be the same as those passed to the unmanaged operating system function that performs the asynchronous I/O. 在 i/o 操作的持续时间内，运行时会固定`userData` 中指定的缓冲区。The runtime pins the buffer or buffers specified in`userData` for the duration of the I/O operation. 如果卸载了应用程序域，则运行时会将内存保持固定状态，直到 i/o 操作完成。If the application domain is unloaded, the runtime keeps the memory pinned until the I/O operation completes. > [!CAUTION] > 使用 方法可能会无意中打开安全漏洞。Using the method could inadvertently open up a security hole. 代码访问安全性根据堆栈上所有调用方的权限检查其权限。Code access security bases its permission checks on the permissions of all the callers on the stack. 方法不传播调用堆栈。The method does not propagate the calling stack. 恶意代码可以利用此漏洞来避免权限检查。Malicious code might be able to exploit this to avoid permission checks.
